member.name: T:MAILSYSTEMCORE.DOMAIN.Primitives.Enumeration`1
member.summary: Represents an enumeration of objects with a unique numeric identifier and a name.

member.name: M:MAILSYSTEMCORE.DOMAIN.Primitives.Enumeration`1.#ctor(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:MAILSYSTEMCORE.DOMAIN.Primitives.Enumeration`1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:MAILSYSTEMCORE.DOMAIN.Primitives.Enumeration`1.GetValues
member.returns: The read-only collection of enumeration values.

member.name: M:MAILSYSTEMCORE.DOMAIN.Primitives.Enumeration`1.FromId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an enumeration of the specified type based on the specified identifier.
member.returns: The enumeration instance that matches the specified identifier, if it exists.

member.name: M:MAILSYSTEMCORE.DOMAIN.Primitives.Enumeration`1.FromName(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an enumeration of the specified type based on the specified name.
member.returns: The enumeration instance that matches the specified name, if it exists.

member.name: M:MAILSYSTEMCORE.DOMAIN.Primitives.Enumeration`1.Contains(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if the enumeration with the specified identifier exists.
member.returns: True if an enumeration with the specified identifier exists, otherwise false.
